title: Footybot Help !
desc: Displays all available commands. Command prefix is '-'

fields.name: :one: -cc
fields.value: Displays competitions and their Respective Codes

fields.name: :two: -tc
fields.value: Displays teams and their their Respective Codes

fields.name: :three: -standings <league_code>
fields.value: Dispays League standings & points table ex: -standings pl
